Attention to detail to ensure the quality and reliability of the application.

Blockchains will only consider candidates who reside in the U.S. and do not require any VISA support.
OUR VISION

In the new and exciting world of the decentralized internet, otherwise known as Web3, it is an individual’s fundamental right to own and control their digital identity. To ensure that the individual is paramount in Web3, we are developing a suite of applications to enable everyone to safely engage, take part, and transact in the emerging, decentralized world of the internet. Our platform centers on Web3 Identity and leverages that identity to provide individuals with secure digital asset storage and recovery, access to decentralized finance, the ability to prove ownership of their creations, and gateways to digital interactions and experiences – all to empower and benefit every Web3 user.

We believe that the decentralized nature of Web3 creates an opportunity for everyone to challenge the digital status quo—to own and control their identity, data, finances, creations, and future. This is the chance to get it right – to rally a movement of individuals so Web3 belongs to everyone, not to trillion-dollar companies. To fulfill this vision, we are seeking dynamic people who want to join us in leading the way to this new world.
WHAT YOU WILL DO

As a Sr. Software Engineer - Android, you will be responsible for the coding, innovative design, and layout of Android applications to support the vision of our Product and UX teams. You will support UX concept design and contribute to bottom-up technical designs with our Mobile App team. You will work extensively as a hands-on software engineer building enterprise-grade mobile apps in Android and contributing to multi-platform (iOS/Android) components and services. You are passionate about your craft, have experience building and supporting Web apps in production, and are seeking opportunities to hone your skills in the world of Web3. Additional duties include, but are not limited to:
• Building Android frameworks with minimal guidance
• Working with our iOS team on cross-platform solutions and common design patterns
• Daily use of Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
• Regular use of coroutines, JSON & RESTful APIs, SQLlite
• Debugging and performance testing of code
• Writing clean, well-factored, and tested UI code
• Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks
• Using GitLab, Figma, JIRA, and Confluence for day-to-day work
WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED

This role is intended for a highly motivated and experienced Android developer who has successfully delivered Android apps into production for large user bases. To ensure success, you must have a passion for mobile app development and software best practices. You have extensive experience writing software and see the joy in working with others to develop, test, and deliver software into production, and consider yourself an emerging expert in using Kotlin. You are passionate about modern software architectures and deployment strategies and continuously seek ways to improve the systems you support. You are technical and business-minded, taking a risk-based approach to prioritize efforts. You are outgoing and love collaborating with others, engaging with your team on group calls, and working closely with your teammates. You work well with numerous cross-functional teams in a fast-paced, growing company.

You have a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or other technical discipline, with 5+ years of professional experience at software companies. You have at least 3 years of hands-on mobile application development experience for enterprise-grade apps used by at least thousands of daily users. Previous experience with decentralized applications, decentralized identities, and blockchain technology is preferred. Experience working at a software startup is desired.

Blockchains provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, national origin, age, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.

(“Controller”), which is located at 610 Waltham Way, Sparks, NV 89437 and can be contacted by emailing privacy@blockchains.com. job_description:
Our world is mobile — the phones in our pockets, our 10+ IoT devices at home, the cars we drive, the way we conduct our work, and the point-of-sale devices from which we buy our coffee and donuts. Embrace is on a mission to make all of our edge experiences exceptional by helping revolutionary companies evolve and excel in this mobile-world that did not exist even 7 years ago. Customers, like Goat, Hilton, Masterclass, Home Depot, and Cameo, love Embrace’s mobile observability and data platform because it makes extremely complicated and voluminous data actionable.
About the Role

Embrace is seeking a driven and passionate DevRel Engineer to help establish and shape Embrace’s mobile developer community. Our goal is to win the trust of mobile developers and builders by meeting them where they are and providing the right technical education, tools, and resources to enable their success. As Developer Relations Engineer, you will need fluency in coding, software engineering goals, challenges, modes of communication, and tooling. You will need to establish credibility, thought leadership, inspiration, and trust with our community, and promote a spirit of collaboration and grassroots advocacy that equips our users to succeed with Embrace and helps drive new users and prospects.
What You’ll Do
• Manage relationships with key Embrace users, and partner with these community leaders, fulfilling our commitments to the community and ensuring our user experience is best-in-class.
• Write detailed blog posts and how-to articles with code samples to our growing community of developers working.
• Answer technical questions on community forums.
• Partner with Product, Engineering and Product Marketing to produce developer-facing documentation and training materials for Embrace SDKs and APIs to foster the growth of our developer community
• Contribute to the product through feedback (bugs or product enhancements suggestions), documentation, or code, including participation in open source projects, create of example projects etc
• Lead Engineering content, including the creation of content for our engineering blog
• Define a comprehensive developer community program, including marketing program strategy, content, event and webinar/podcast strategy, and more.
• Partner with our engineering team to deliver educational content to community members, expanding their skills and product fluency while driving advocacy.
• Manage communications with the developer community and prospective new members across social media, online periodicals, and forum websites.
• Collaborate with internal and external marketing resources to scale your developer community programs globally.
Basic Qualifications
• Outstanding communication and social networking skills.
• A storyteller, highly creative, energetic, and communicative; with good writing and presentation skills
• A iOS and/or Android engineering background
• A passion for engineering culture, languages, tools, etc
• A data driven, KPI mindset with a history of using a test-and-learn approach to drive incremental results
• High competency and low ego, you have a passion for helping people both inside and outside of your company
Preferred Qualifications
• Experience cultivating and growing developer communities preferred
• Experience increasing employer brand awareness and utilizing various digital and in-person mechanisms to generate buzz and excitement preferred
• Experience embedding in engineering teams and partnering with engineers to create content, and to engage in external events preferred
Culture Values
• Perspective - seeking to understand others’ perspectives
• Investing - investing in discovering value, unprompted
• Honesty - delivering brutal honesty kindly
• Simplest - finding the simplest solutions by focusing on outcomes
• Ownership - empowering yourself and others through solutions, not answers
• Dark Humor - finding levity together, even when tackling hard problems
Why join Embrace?

Embrace is growing and recently raised a Series B backed by YCombinator, NEA, Greycroft, and the founders of Testflight, Parse, and PagerDuty. The repeat founding team also started Scopely, a $3B+ unicorn mobile startup. Enterprises, revolutionaries, and vendors rely on the Embrace Data Platform to capture 100% of user-behavioral and technical time-based session data rather than relying on sampling. The engineering, data science, UX, and product teams at NYTimes, Hyatt, OkCupid, and Owlet are driving their businesses with Embrace.

The cash compensation for this role is dependent upon the leveling of the right candidate, starting at a base of $120K for someone earlier in their DevRel career and can go up to a base of $180K. In addition to cash comp, we offer equity in the form of options, a variety of benefits, and the opportunity to grow in an exciting and collaborative environment.
